world

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides everything related to the snowball fight: map, teams, snowballs, flag, etc.
    Author:
    Mathieu Plourde - mat.plourde@gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double ADVANCED_VISIBILITY_RADIUS
      Visibility radius of players in advanced mode -> 225
      static int MAX_FRAME_COUNT
      Total number of frames in a full length game -> 9000
      9000 frames at 30 fps -> 5 minutes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      World(Team[] teams, Map map, Flag flag, java.util.ArrayList<Snowball> snowballs) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canPickFlag()
      Returns whether the flag can/can't be picked by players.
      int getCurrentFrame()
      Returns the current frame of the game
      Team getCurrentTeam()
      Returns the current team.
      Flag getFlag()
      Returns the flag of the game.
      Map getMap()
      Returns the map of the game.
      Team[] getOtherTeams()
      Returns an array containing all teams other than the current one.
      java.util.ArrayList<Snowball> getSnowballs()
      Returns a list of snowballs visible to the current team.
      Team[] getTeams()
      Returns the array of teams.

      • canPickFlag

        public boolean canPickFlag()
        Returns whether the flag can/can't be picked by players. The flag can be picked if the proportion of dead players >= PickFlagAction.DEAD_PROPORTION_TO_PICK, or if the game is halfway done.
        Returns:
